lines.text: Maybe this is... also someone who got burnt up in the fire?
I mean, we can't touch it, right? So who's to say it's actually made of stone, and it's not just someone who turned to ash?
You mean, who's to say besides the law of gravity?
The dang thing would fall apart if it were made of ash.
...Not necessarily! What if it was frozen in place somehow?
Or maybe only the outside of them is ash, and there's a whole person underneath?
No. Not made of ash. There's no dustin' of the stuff by the feet, or any sign of a fire on this side of the room.
And if it was a person who caught fire, they wouldn't have a full bushy beard like that. It'd have burned away.
I think it's pretty much what it looks like, Seeker. A statue.
Hm... well, if you say so.
